story_dialogue.start_necroverso_text: Hello stranger... welcome! You are in the Inversus, and I am the Necroverso. If you wish to return to your world, you must challenge the sovereigns of this place...
story_dialogue.pre_tutorial_prompt_text: Yes, through a duel! They play a card and board game called REVERSUS. Would you like me to teach you the basics in a match?
story_dialogue.tutorial_skip_text: You must be a prodigy... Good luck then. Face Contravox.
story_dialogue.tutorial_explain_1_text: Great. The main rule is: have the highest score at the end of the round to advance on the board. Simple, right?
story_dialogue.tutorial_explain_2_text: Your score is the sum of two VALUE cards you play. If you have 2 or more value cards, you MUST play one. If you have only one, it is saved for the next round, your last played card will be your "Rest".
story_dialogue.tutorial_explain_3_text: EFFECT cards can change everything! "More" and "Less" use the value of your "Rest" to increase or decrease your score. "Up", "Down", and "Jump" move your pawn.
story_dialogue.tutorial_explain_4_text: "Reversus" and "Reversus Total" cards are more complex and can turn the game around. You will learn their power in practice.
story_dialogue.tutorial_explain_5_text: Enough talk. Let's play. Don't think about winning, just about learning the rules.
story_dialogue.tutorial_loss_text: It seems you are not ready yet. Remember, the goal is to learn. Let's try again.
story_dialogue.post_tutorial_text: And with that, we finish the tutorial... I hope you understood everything. Your first real challenge awaits.
story_dialogue.pre_contravox_intro_text: I will tell you two secrets about Contravox to help you in your duel...
story_dialogue.pre_contravox_hint_text: Since I'm nice, I'll tell you... Contravox is the weakest of the three... and he has a special ability... watch out for it!
story_dialogue.pre_contravox_hint_option_1: Was that supposed to be a secret?
story_dialogue.post_contravox_victory_text: Incredible... you really defeated Contravox... now only two more remain, the next is Versatrix, but be careful... not everything is as it seems.
story_dialogue.pre_versatrix_intro_text: Versatrix is a Gemini... and she is... valuable!
story_dialogue.start_versatrix_dialogue_text_1: I feel like we've met in another life...
story_dialogue.start_versatrix_dialogue_text_2: I don't want to lose... but if you beat me... I will still help you...
story_dialogue.versatrix_solteira_text: Well... you opportunist, let's just duel!
story_dialogue.post_versatrix_victory_option_1: When I defeat them... what happens?
story_dialogue.post_versatrix_defeat_text: Don't worry... I will help you at the right time
story_dialogue.post_versatrix_ask_return_text:
You are getting closer to returning to your world...
Defeat King Reversum and I will give you a chance to return to your world
story_dialogue.pre_reversum_intro_text: Two valuable pieces of information... he is the most powerful and is immune to red!
story_dialogue.pre_reversum_intro_option_1: Is that supposed to help me?
story_dialogue.pre_reversum_intro_option_2: I hope this is over soon
story_dialogue.start_reversum_text: I AM KING REVERSUM TOTEM! BOW BEFORE YOUR KING!
story_dialogue.start_reversum_option_2: I just want to finish the game...
story_dialogue.post_reversum_victory_text: Finally, with them defeated, the Inversus is mine.
story_dialogue.final_confrontation_1_text: I didn't lie, I will give you a chance to return... however, if you defeat me.
story_dialogue.necroverso_king_battle_intro_text: Hahaha! Thanks to you, I have full control over the kings you defeated! And they will fight for me! But, to be fair, I will explain the rules: in this combat, whoever has the lowest score in the round loses a heart. Lose them all... and you will be eliminated forever!
story_dialogue.post_necroverso_king_victory_text: You... defeated me? Impossible! For now, you are free. But know that this is not the end. I will be back...
story_dialogue.versatrix_warning_1_text: Wait! Before you face him, know that he cannot be beaten just by reaching the center of the board first... and don't let his darkness touch you...
story_dialogue.versatrix_warning_1_option_2: I don't know what to do...
story_dialogue.versatrix_warning_2_text: I will help you... together we will win!
story_dialogue.pre_final_battle_text: Two tips for you... your time is up and there is no escape!
story_dialogue.pre_final_battle_option_1: That didn't sound like a tip...
story_dialogue.xael_challenge_intro_text: So you accept my challenge! The rules here are different. The goal is to reach space 10 with MORE stars than me. Collect them on the board and use their effects wisely. Ready?
story_dialogue.endgame_dialogue_1: We did it! You defeated him!
story_dialogue.endgame_dialogue_3: Even if you defeat me... the Inversus... will never cease to exist.
story_dialogue.endgame_dialogue_4: And with time... a new Necroverso will emerge.
story_dialogue.endgame_dialogue_5: He's gone... for now. You saved us. Thank you.
story_dialogue.endgame_dialogue_6: I think it's time for you to go home, isn't it? Or... if you want, you can stay. The choice is yours.

event_abilities.january_new: Can make a red path appear in front of him at the start of each round (50% chance).
event_abilities.february_new: Swaps 'Rest' cards with the opponent at the start of each round, if it's favorable.
event_abilities.march_new: At the start of his turn, draws 2 value cards and discards 2, prioritizing keeping the higher value ones.
event_abilities.april_new: Once per turn, can ignore a negative effect played against him.
event_abilities.may_new: Plays his value and effect cards face down, revealing them only at the end of the round.
event_abilities.june_new: Can reuse an effect card that was used this round once per round.
event_abilities.july_new: Has a chance (50%) to steal a random card from your hand per round.
event_abilities.august_new: Can swap places on the board with the opponent once per match.
event_abilities.september_new: Once per round, can peek at and swap a card from your hand with one from his.
event_abilities.october_new: Once per round (50% chance), can force everyone to discard the highest value card from their hands.
event_abilities.november_new: Once per round, can 'freeze' an opponent's effect card, preventing it from being played this round.
event_abilities.december_new: At the start of each round, he can swap hands with you (50% chance).
